# stop()

**Instance Method**

Stops all data providers running in this session.

## Declaration

```swift
final func stop()
```

## Discussion

ARKit also automatically stops sessions when they’re deinitialized.

## Starting and stopping a session

- **init()**: Creates a new session.
- **run(_:)**: Runs a session with the data providers you supply.
- **ARKitSession.Error**: An error that might occur when running data providers on an ARKit session.
